statements: SELECT * FROM trades WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT trade_id, symbol, entry_price FROM trades WHERE entry_price > 100;
SELECT symbol, profit FROM trades WHERE profit IS NOT NULL ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE entry_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT symbol, exit_price FROM trades WHERE exit_timestamp < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY exit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND profit > 1000 ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, entry_price, exit_price, profit FROM trades WHERE profit < 0.5 ORDER BY exit_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, entry_price AS investment, exit_price AS sell_price, (exit_price - entry_price) AS ROI FROM trades WHERE profit IS NULL;
SELECT symbol, profit FROM trades WHERE entry_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND exit_timestamp >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT AVG(profit) AS average_profit, COUNT(trade_id) AS total_trades FROM trades WHERE profit IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM historical_price_movements;
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM historical_price_movements WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name, pattern_description FROM trading_patterns WHERE pattern_strength='Strong';
SELECT symbol, high_price, low_price, close_price FROM historical_price_movements ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM historical_price_movements WHERE date='2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, date, open_price FROM historical_price_movements;
SELECT symbol, close_price, date FROM historical_price_movements ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_price_movements WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT symbol, MAX(high_price) AS highest_price FROM historical_price_movements GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_strength, last_updated FROM trading_patterns ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, entry_price, exit_price FROM trading_patterns WHERE entry_price > 1000
SELECT * FROM trading_patterns WHERE id = 3
SELECT opportunity_name, risk_level FROM trading_opportunities ORDER BY risk_level DESC
SELECT MAX(price) as highest_price FROM price_movements WHERE symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT * FROM trading_opportunities WHERE potential_profit BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM trading_patterns ORDER BY pattern_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM trading_patterns WHERE entry_price > 100 ORDER BY entry_price ASC
SELECT pattern_name, entry_price, exit_price FROM trading_patterns WHERE entry_price > exit_price AND exit_price < 50
SELECT id, pattern_name, entry_price, exit_price FROM trading_patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%reversal%' ORDER BY entry_price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT tp.pattern_name, po.opportunity_name, po.potential_profit FROM trading_patterns tp INNER JOIN trading_opportunities po ON tp.id = po.id WHERE po.risk_level = 'High'
SELECT * FROM PriceMovements ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_name, open_price, close_price FROM PriceMovements WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM PricePatterns WHERE LENGTH(pattern_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM TradingOpportunities WHERE strategy_name = 'Trend Following' AND profit > 0.1 ORDER BY opportunity_date ASC;
SELECT signal_timestamp, buy_sell, signal_strength FROM TradingSignals WHERE signal_strength >= 0.7;
SELECT date, stock_name, close_price FROM PriceMovements WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM PricePatterns WHERE LENGTH(pattern_description) > 50;
SELECT opportunity_date, strategy_name, profit FROM TradingOpportunities WHERE profit > 1000 ORDER BY opportunity_date ASC;
SELECT signal_timestamp, buy_sell, signal_strength FROM TradingSignals WHERE buy_sell = 'BUY' AND signal_strength >= 0.8;
SELECT stock_name, open_price, close_price, high_price, low_price FROM PriceMovements WHERE stock_name = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalPriceData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, close_price, high_price FROM HistoricalPriceData WHERE price_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price, high_price, low_price FROM HistoricalPriceData WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL');
SELECT * FROM TradeHistory ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, action, price FROM TradingOpportunities WHERE opportunity_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalPriceData ORDER BY price_date DESC, symbol ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM HistoricalPriceData WHERE symbol='AAPL' AND price_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY price_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT symbol, high_price, low_price FROM HistoricalPriceData WHERE price_date >= '2021-01-01' AND price_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY high_price DESC, low_price ASC;
SELECT symbol, AVG(close_price) AS average_close_price FROM HistoricalPriceData GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(close_price) > 100 ORDER BY average_close_price DESC;

SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_name, trade_date, action, symbol, opportunity_description FROM TradingOpportunities WHERE opportunity_name LIKE '%long%' AND action='BUY' ORDER BY trade_date ASC LIMIT 5;
